-e ---

𓉐 𓏤 𓈖 𓆓 𓏏 𓇾 estate, foundation : nation

𒉄 NAGAR 𓋹𓈖𓐍 نجار ܢܓܪܐ ܢܓܪܘܬܐ origin, descent, stock, root, anchor

𓄟 menes moses mnais genesis

𓈙 𓈙 𓅸 nest | 𓈙 = 𒎎 NA(Tᶥ) 𒉌𒌓 NI+zT nît ⇔ nation

Proto-Dravidian *nāṭu. ನಾಟ nāṭa land ನಾಡು (nāḍu) 𑀦𑀸𑀝𑀷𑁆 nāṭaṉ நாடு nāṭu

https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/%E0%B2%A8%E0%B2%BE%E0%B2%9F

e.g. tamiḻ nāṭu Tamil Nation
